description:
Gao and his friends wander through the maze-like forest as they try to stop Sakate and Keisetsu. Wisdom appears before Guru Bunbuku and tries to destroy the Mirage Card. A Buddyfight ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Guru vs. Wisdom! The Shocking Geargod VIII!
Shishou VS Wisdom! Shougeki no Geargod VIII!
師匠VSウィズダム! 衝撃のギアゴッドVIII!!
